00002  * CAnkhShield.cpp

00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "CAnkhShield.h"
00009 #include "../../spritedefines.h"
00010 
00011 const unsigned int ANKH_FLICKER_DELAY = 3;
00012 const unsigned int ANKH_SHIELD_FRAME = 61;
00013 
00014 CAnkhShield::CAnkhShield(CPlayer &attachedPlayer) :
00015 CObject(attachedPlayer.getMapPtr(),
00016   attachedPlayer.getXPosition(),
00017   attachedPlayer.getYPosition(),
00018   OBJ_ANKHSHIELD),
00019 m_attachedPlayer(attachedPlayer),
00020 ankhtime(attachedPlayer.ankhtime)
00021 {
00022  ankhtime=PLAY_ANKH_TIME;
00023  frame = 0;
00024  timer = 0;
00025  inhibitfall = true;
00026  canbezapped = false;
00027  state = ANKH_STATE_NOFLICKER;
00028  sprite = ANKH_SHIELD_FRAME;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void CAnkhShield::process()
00032 {
00033  if(m_attachedPlayer.godmode)
00034   ankhtime=PLAY_ANKH_TIME;
00035 
00036  if (!ankhtime)
00037  {
00038   exists = false;
00039   return;
00040  }
00041  else if (ankhtime < ANKH_STAGE3_TIME)
00042   state = ANKH_STATE_FLICKERSLOW;
00043  else if (ankhtime < ANKH_STAGE2_TIME)
00044   state = ANKH_STATE_FLICKERFAST;
00045  else
00046   state = ANKH_STATE_NOFLICKER;
00047 
00048  ankhtime--;
00049 
00050  moveToForce(m_attachedPlayer.getXPosition()-(8<<STC), m_attachedPlayer.getYPosition()-(8<<STC));
00051 
00052  switch(state)
00053  {
00054  case ANKH_STATE_NOFLICKER:
00055   sprite = ANKH_SHIELD_FRAME + (frame&1);
00056   break;
00057  case ANKH_STATE_FLICKERFAST:
00058   if (frame&1)
00059    sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00060   else
00061   {
00062    if (frame&2)
00063     sprite = ANKH_SHIELD_FRAME+1;
00064    else
00065     sprite = ANKH_SHIELD_FRAME;
00066   }
00067   break;
00068  case ANKH_STATE_FLICKERSLOW:
00069   if (frame>4)
00070    sprite = BLANKSPRITE;
00071   else
00072    sprite = ANKH_SHIELD_FRAME;
00073   break;
00074  }
00075 
00076  if (timer > ANKH_FLICKER_DELAY)
00077  {
00078   frame++;
00079   if (frame>8) frame = 0;
00080   timer = 0;
00081  }
00082  else timer++;
00083 }
